testcase.name: testInvalid

failure.message: Expected: (an instance of java.lang.IllegalArgumentException and exception with message a string containing "token recognition error at: '#'") but: exception with message a string containing "token recognition error at: '#'" message was "Exception parsing expression: 'extraneous input '2' expecting {PLUS, MINUS, TIMES, DIV, ')'}' on line 1, position 6" Stacktrace was: java.lang.IllegalArgumentException: Exception parsing expression: 'extraneous input '2' expecting {PLUS, MINUS, TIMES, DIV, ')'}' on line 1, position 6 at
